data.title: Hollywood: Her Story
data.meta_description: Female Academy Award nominees and winners since the first year the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences has been awarding the coveted Oscar statuette. Winners are highlighted as well as nominations shared by men.
data.text:
Female Academy Award

Nominees & Winners by Year

Below are the female Academy Award nominations and winners since the first year the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences has been awarding the coveted Oscar statuette.

Winners are highlighted and in bold.

*An asterisk means a shared nomination with one or more men.
